data.name: Riders of Icarus - Legendary Trickster's Guile Package
data.detailed_description:
Embark on a journey to bring light back to a bleak world. With the official Riders of Icarus update "Rise of the Trickster", the new Trickster class will be available to fight against the forces of dark. Along with this massive update, Riders of Icarus will be introducing a new North American and European server for users to start fresh! Prepare yourselves and enter the fray with the Legendary Trickster's Guile Package and receive the following:

Mount: Malokus
Mount: Armored Bear
Pet: Sovereign Cub

Icarian Glory Outfit Package
Includes:
  • Icarian Glory Outfit
  • Icarian Glory Coronet
  • Icarian Glory Wings
  • Icarian Glory Weapon Skin

Legendary Title
  • Effect: Rare Drop Chance +15%

Premium Service (30 Day)
Orchid Fennec Fox (30-Day)
Talisman Package (30 Day)
Includes:
  • Attack Boost Talisman (30 Day)
  • Defense Boost Talisman (30 Day)
  • General Boost Talisman (30 Day)

Designer Bag (24 Slot)
Ellun (200 Pack)

Limit 1 Legendary Trickster's Guile Package per account. Packages are not transferable.

data.short_description: Take the battle to the sky with fantastical flying mount combat unlike anything you’ve seen before in Riders of Icarus, the new unprecedented action-adventure MMORPG experience that lets you ride and fight on the back of the realm’s most dangerous winged beasts…dragons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (SP2) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD A8-5500 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 7670 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD FX-6200 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 6870 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
